moves.1. e4: a brilliant example of the kamshaft mate
moves.4. Nxe5 Qf6: q f6 might have benn better but in that situation he could defend the knight, if he tried that now i could mate him
moves.5. Ng4: this was a brilliant move, simultaneously stopping me from taking the knight and stopping mate
moves.5... Qf5: i move my queen forward so his knight can't move or its mate
moves.6. Ne3: that isn't such a good move
moves.6... Qxf2#: this is what i call the kamshaft mate, like scholars mate but with a knight, also it gets the queen out, but like the scholars mate it is quite obvious and easily stopped
